kds.forms package¶

Submodules¶

kds.forms.fields module¶

Custom fields for WTForm fields, usually by subclassing.

class kds.forms.fields.InputText(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: wtforms.fields.core.StringField

A modified StringField for convienence and localisation.

kds.forms.forms module¶

All forms used in app, build using WTForms.

Bases: wtforms.form.Form

Form for Gewerke.

kds.forms.utils module¶

Tools and utilities used specifically for forms.

kds.forms.utils.pick_from_dict(input_dict, *args)¶

Take items from a dict to build a new dict. Delete the items in the original.

Parameters

  • input_dict – the dict to operate on.

  • *args –

    the keys to pick.

Returns

The new dict and the old dict as a tuple.

kds.forms.utils.popget(input_dict, key, default)¶

Pop and get combined.
